SEARCH
Module com.typinggame
Package com.typinggame.model

Class TypingStats

java.lang.Object
com.typinggame.model.TypingStats
public class TypingStats extends Object
Tracks typing performance metrics during a session, including accuracy, words per minute (WPM), and streaks of correct input. This class is updated in real time as the user types and is used to evaluate session results.
Since:
2025-08-16

  • Constructor Details

    • TypingStats

      public TypingStats(String target)
      Constructs a new TypingStats object for the given target sentence.
      Parameters:
      target - The sentence the user is expected to type

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(String input)
      Updates the current input string.
      Parameters:
      input - The latest input typed by the user

    • isComplete

      public boolean isComplete()
      Checks if the user has completed typing the full target sentence.
      Returns:
      true if the input matches the target sentence; false otherwise

    • calculateWPM

      public int calculateWPM(double elapsedMinutes)
      Calculates the user's typing speed in words per minute (WPM). Assumes one word is defined as a whitespace-separated token.
      Parameters:
      elapsedMinutes - Time elapsed since the start of the session, in minutes
      Returns:
      Estimated words per minute

    • updateAccuracy

      public void updateAccuracy(String userInput, String targetText)
      Updates accuracy statistics based on the current input. Compares typed characters to the target and tracks new errors.
      Parameters:
      userInput - Current input from the user
      targetText - Target sentence to compare against

    • getAccuracy

      public double getAccuracy()
      Returns the current typing accuracy as a percentage.
      Returns:
      Accuracy percentage (0–100)

    • updateStreak

      public void updateStreak(char inputChar, char targetChar)
      Updates the streak count based on the latest character typed. Resets streak on mistake and updates best streak if needed.
      Parameters:
      inputChar - Character typed by the user
      targetChar - Expected character from the target sentence

    • getCurrentStreak

      public int getCurrentStreak()
      Returns the current streak of consecutive correct characters typed.
      Returns:
      Current streak count

    • getBestStreak

      public int getBestStreak()
      Returns the best streak achieved during the session.
      Returns:
      Best streak count
